content: Lions are actually quite skilled at taking down large animals like wildebeest and buffalo. A pride of lions will work together to bring down a large prey animal. They use their strength and teamwork to tire out their prey until it can no longer fight back. Typically, the lionesses will do most of the hunting, while the male lions will defend their territory and protect the pride. Once a prey animal is targeted, the lionesses work together to surround the animal and take it down. Their sharp teeth, strong jaws, and powerful claws are all used to grip and kill the prey quickly. The lion's great size, speed, strength, and ability to work together make them one of the most successful predators in Africa.
